publisher.value: HL7 International - Biomedical Research and Regulation Work Group

description.value: The PCORNet Data Source Type contains the codes to be used by PCORNet data marts.

definition.value: Diagnosis Data Source Type is Admitting.
Diagnosis Data Source Type is Discharge.
Diagnosis Data Source Type is Final, Ambulatory encounters would generally be expected to have a source of “Final”.
Diagnosis Data Source Type is Interim, it is not necessary to populate interim diagnoses unless readily available.
Diagnosis Data Source Type has No information.
Diagnosis Data Source Type is Unknown.
Diagnosis Data Source Type is Other.
